name.$comment: Name of the model (ex: FAQ, Alert, Collection etc.,): displayed to the user in UI

description.$comment: Description of the model (ex: FAQ, Alert, Collection etc.,): description of the model; might be shown to user as a tooltip

icon.$comment: Icon for the model: currently limited to Font Awesome

name.$comment: Name of the Font Awesome icon (ex: )

color.$comment: Background color to be used for the Font Awesome icon (ex: )

schema.$comment: JSON Schema of the model itself

tag.$comment: An array of tags associated with the model: can be used for searching models
